column5: I'm just gidee...and wanted to test the new site out LOL But hey lookie lookie First robins I've seen in 2010, and its now the first day of Spring.  Only 5 weeks until the opener....Woo-hoo!
Saw quite a few robins around this weekend as well. Always a sign of spring
Seen the robins for the last couple of weeks up here and it sure is a good sign April 23rd can't come soon enough Leechman
Sure was like spring around here last couple of weeks. Have not seen a robin yet, but did see a Snowy Owl for first time in west Toronto near the lakeshore. Bring on the softwater fishing
Those robins are a sight for sore eyes....
Soon enough those robins will sing very loudly in the morning, my 6AM nature alarm. Follow by spring shower that leaves myself and the Robins to competing for the fattest worm.
Hmmmmm, I haven't seen a single Robin yet this year.  Probably a little early for them up here, that and it was -30 last night!!!!
